Eight of the primer pairs yielded qPCR results that confirmed the differential expression identified by EBSeq ( Supplementary Figures 2 ,
3 ), and the difference was confirmed by Studentâ€™s t-test ( p-value < 0.05). The remaining primers showed statistically significant differences between the levels of expression in the equatorial and subtropical regions [primers DBR (leaf), CesA (leaf) and GID1B (root)] ( Supplementary Figures 2 ,
3 ).
